attributes.comment:
Please really consider the implication of these fee changes on the families trying
to adopt children abroad. I know that not all countries are taking as long as China
but China is the country that we have applied through. These vital and required
fees have already cost us $685 if you increase your fees our second round that
we will need due to expiration will cost us an additional $830. I think that a rate
hike of $135 is a lot of money especially when so much is spent on the process
already. Please evaluate this proposed change and verify that the rate hike is
appropriate and fair.
Thank you,
Tina Kristoff
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Tina M. Kristoff
